thread.title: Developer will build 24 cluster houses in Strongsville, despite protests from residents
thread.title_full: Developer will build 24 cluster houses in Strongsville, despite protests from residents

author: Bob Sandrick, special to cleveland.com
title: Developer will build 24 cluster houses in Strongsville, despite protests from residents
text: Pulte Homes, an Atlanta-based developer, will build 24 cluster houses off the west side of Pearl Road, just north of Boston Road, despite the protests of residents already living in the area. At least five residents said Pulte representatives previously promised the firm would not build additional homes on the site now slated for the 24 cluster houses.
